node.title: My favorite silent English letter is:
node.author: chacham

data.field: a as in aisle b as in subpoena c as in muscle d as in badge e as in pie f as in halfpenny g as in foreign h as in hour i as in business j as in hajj k as in know l as in would m as in mneumonic n as in autumn o as in opossum p as in pneumonia q as in lacquer r as in surprise s as in island t as in depot u as in build v as in revving w as in wrong x as in faux y as in they're z as in rendezvous
